Package de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel

This package contains the classes relted to the Control Panel, that is, the right side panel of Siafu when a simulation is running.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgentsPanel
    This class defines the panel that displays the agents in the GUI.
    AgentStatus
    The status item that displays information on an Agent.
    BasePanel
    An abstract clas for the panels in the simulator's gui.
    BaseStatus
    The base status item implementation.
    Clock
    A clock showing the simulation's time, pause controls and speed scale.
    ControlPanel
    The control panel displayed on the right hand side of the simulation's shell.
    LabelPair
    A pair of labels, the first, intended for the caption or key, in bold, and the second, for the value, in normal font.
    OverlaysPanel
    This is the panel that contains the overlays in the simulation.
    OverlayStatus
    The status item for overlays.
    PlacesPanel
    This class defines the panel that displays the places in the GUI.
    PlaceStatus
    The status item that displays information on a Place.

Package de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel Description

This package contains the classes relted to the Control Panel, that is, the right side panel of Siafu when a simulation is running.
